txt_en: Success is the sum of small efforts — repeated day in and day out.
txt_cn: 成功就是日复一日那一点点小小努力的积累。
author: Robert Collier

txt_en: Working hard is important. But there is something that matters even more: believing in yourself.
txt_cn: 努力很重要，然而更重要的是：相信自己。
author: 《哈利·波特与凤凰社》

txt_en: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
txt_cn: 应对压力最强大的武器，是你有能力换个想法。
author: William James
